messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Disciplining toddlers, was Re: "Expert" Advice (Was ...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/6/01 9:45:45 PM Pacific Daylight Time, ravensegg@yahoo.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/6/01 9:45:45 PM Pacific Daylight Time,
ravensegg@... writes:

<< I
understand my kid better than anyone else in the
world, and I am absolutely sure of that. >>

Eileen, I think your situation is very different than that of most
parents. You are right; you know the reality of your situation and from the
things you have said, I can understand your point. Also, you are talking
about spanking once with an unusual combination of circumstances. I think
what most people who object to spanking are referring to is the more
commonplace situations where there truly are many other choices available
besides spanking. I am sorry if anything I have said was insulting in any
way to you.

Lucy
